caption.p: IPMA results demonstrating the replication abilities of CSFV in high- and low-permissive PK15 cells at different time points. Different cell lines were fixed at 6, 12, 18, 24, 36, and 48 h post CSFV infection and stained with CSFV-specific antibodies followed by HRP-conjugated secondary antibodies (400Ã—)
